Protocols/SudoNotificationFilterClient.h.name: serviceName
Protocols/SudoNotificationFilterClient.h.abstract: Name of service for the implementing Sudo Platform SDK. Matches the corresponding service’s configuration

Protocols/SudoNotificationFilterClient.h.name: getSchema()
Protocols/SudoNotificationFilterClient.h.abstract: Return the schema describing properties available for filtering for the specific service

Protocols/NotificationDeviceInputProvide.name: buildType
Protocols/NotificationDeviceInputProvide.abstract: String representation of the build type to assign to a device or device info.

Protocols/NotificationDeviceInputProvide.name: appName
Protocols/NotificationDeviceInputProvide.abstract: App name, e.g. “MYSUDO”. Used to route the push notifications to the correct app.

Protocols/NotificationDeviceInputProvide.name: bundleIdentifier
Protocols/NotificationDeviceInputProvide.abstract: The bundle identifier to assign to any devices or device info.

Protocols/NotificationDeviceInputProvide.name: appVersion
Protocols/NotificationDeviceInputProvide.abstract: String representation of the application version a device is for.

Protocols/NotificationDeviceInputProvide.name: pushToken
Protocols/NotificationDeviceInputProvide.abstract: The registered APNs token used for delivering push notifications.

Protocols/NotificationDeviceInputProvide.name: voipToken
Protocols/NotificationDeviceInputProvide.abstract: The registered PushKit voip token used for delivering voip/call notifications.

Protocols/SudoNotificationClient.html#/s.name: getNotificationConfiguration(device:)
Protocols/SudoNotificationClient.html#/s.abstract: Get the current set of notification configuration on this device

Protocols/SudoNotificationClient.html#/s.name: deRegisterNotification(device:)
Protocols/SudoNotificationClient.html#/s.abstract: DeRgister for push notification for the user on this device

Protocols/SudoNotificationClient.html#/s.name: registerNotification(device:)
Protocols/SudoNotificationClient.html#/s.abstract: Register for push notification for the user on this device

Protocols/SudoNotificationClient.html#/s.name: setNotificationConfiguration(config:)
Protocols/SudoNotificationClient.html#/s.abstract: Set the notification configuration for the user.

Protocols/SudoNotificationClient.html#/s.name: updateNotificationRegistration(device:)
Protocols/SudoNotificationClient.html#/s.abstract: Update push notification registration for the user on this device

Protocols/SudoNotificationClient.html.name: SudoNotificationClient
Protocols/SudoNotificationClient.html.abstract: Client used to interface with the Sudo Notification Platform service.

Protocols/NotificationDeviceInputProvide.name: NotificationDeviceInputProvider
Protocols/NotificationDeviceInputProvide.abstract: NotificationDeviceInputProvider conforming instances are required to provide an accurate representation of the current device information.

Enums/CachePolicy.html#/s:16SudoNotifica.abstract: Query and use the data on the server.

Enums/SudoNotificationError.html#/s:16Su.name: notificationServiceConfigNotFound
Enums/SudoNotificationError.html#/s:16Su.abstract: The configuration related to Notification Service is not found in the provided configuration file

Enums/SudoNotificationError.html#/s:16Su.abstract: Indicates the requested operation failed because the user account is locked.

Enums/SudoNotificationError.html#/s:16Su.name: alreadyRegistered
Enums/SudoNotificationError.html#/s:16Su.abstract: Already registered for push notification, should call update registration

Enums/SudoNotificationError.html#/s:16Su.abstract: Indicates that the request operation failed due to authorization error. This maybe due to the authentication

Enums/SudoNotificationError.html#/s:16Su.name: serviceError
Enums/SudoNotificationError.html#/s:16Su.abstract: Indicates that an internal server error caused the operation to fail. The error is possibly transient and

Enums/SudoNotificationError.html#/s:16Su.name: requestFailed(response:cause:)
Enums/SudoNotificationError.html#/s:16Su.abstract: Indicates that the request failed due to connectivity, availability or access error.

Enums/SudoNotificationError.html#/s:16Su.name: graphQLError(cause:)
Enums/SudoNotificationError.html#/s:16Su.abstract: Indicates that an unexpected GraphQL error was returned by the service.

Enums/SudoNotificationError.html#/s:16Su.abstract: Indicates that a fatal error occurred. This could be due to coding error, out-of-memory condition or other

Enums/SudoNotificationError.html#/s:16Su.abstract: Indicates that a service error was returned.
